name: 30 Pictures - Jam ver.
description:
made 6/6-6/8 at Isolation Jam in Iceland

Take some nice pictures on a beautiful island.  Discover the wildlife, have a chill time.  When you run out of film the game ends and you can you can see & save all your pictures.  

There's a good chance I will keep working on this, making it more of a 'game': expanding the world, adding more creatures and secrets, more interactivity.  I will be unable to work on this the next few weeks (traveling & camping in Iceland) but if you have any thoughts, suggestions, or technical problems (quite possible) please reach out.

credits to come

thx to zylann for his wonderful terrain tool & general support
